monsterSenses: Senses blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)
monsterLanguages: Languages understands Common but can't speak
monsterSpecials: False Appearance. While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.
monsterActions: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
